name: 100 Mystery Buttons - Escape
description:
Only 1 lets you escape!

100 Mystery Button Challenge is here! It is a super fun game with easy controls!

Find the only that lets you escape the box!
Tap on the buttons to trigger events that are either good or bad!
Play minigames that reward you with protection items like helmets or get a towel to wipe the slime on you!
developers: Panteon Yazilim Oyun Egitim Teknolojileri ve Hizmetleri Sanayi Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
publishers: Panteon Yazilim Oyun Egitim Teknolojileri ve Hizmetleri Sanayi Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
